author: everstake
title: Cardanomonitor
description: As the Cardano ecosystem and SPO role grow, there is a need for new infrastructure and services.
solution: Cardanomonitor will be open-source analytics platform for Cardano blockchain with focus on business and some new features
experience: Everstake is a team of experienced developers, financial experts, and blockchain enthusiasts, with active presence in 50+ blockchains.
